attributes.action: Introduce a No-Kill policy for all pet-type animals
attributes.additional_details:
Links to the story of Max:

http://www.telegraph.co.uk/lifestyle/pets/12060747/Elderly-couple-demand-to-know-why-beloved-dog-was-put-down-by-charity.html

http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/uk-news/cancer-patient-collapses-dog-asked-7052638
attributes.background: Many countries have banned the euthanasia of healthy dogs and cats. In the light of the recent case of Max, destroyed by the charity Blue Cross against the owner's wishes, Britain should revoke what amounts to capital punishment of pets and restore its leadership role in animal welfare.
